dictionary.definition: An attractive woman. Also a cute pig that is clever enough to pass as attractive.
The unwed parent of a bastard.
1. A secret lover who sneaks in the backdoor to avoid detection. 2. A man who prefers anal sex. 3. A gay man.
A top who tells the bottom what to do sexually while penetrating the bottom from behind.
1. A meaty vagina, characterized by a loose labia minora that appears stretched out from excessive use. 2. Shit stains left on underwear. Synonyms: beef curtains.
The vaginal version of halitosis, caused by an imbalance of the growth of harmful bacteria versus protective bacteria in the vagina.
A person who metaphorically pounds your balls with unnecessary nagging, teasing, joking, or harassing.
A fetishistic act in which a man enjoys being kicked, kneed, or otherwise pounded in the balls.
A mouth gag in which a ball-like object is tied into a person's mouth to prevent them from speaking or screaming.
A sport in which men try to trick others into looking at their exposed scrotum, which is often manipulated to appear in a variety of shapes.
A high art in which a man seduces women without the aide of a healthy bank account.
An asshole, as it resembles the clinched rubber around a balloon’s knot.
Fully committed, as when a man penetrates an orifice as far as he can go. Antonym: just the tip.
To fully commit and exert tremendous energy to complete a task.
